description: What do you get when you cross a muffin with a doughnut? These share-worthy doughnut muffins! Made using a pancake shaker, it can't get any easier than this.
keywords: Sweet muffin,Strawberry,Seafood free,Autumn,Sesame free,Apr 2021,Summer,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Doughnut Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Grease 2 x 12-hole mini (1 1/2 tablespoon-capacity) muffin pans.

Prepare pancake mix according to shaker instructions. Pour mixture into holes. Bake for 15 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centres comes out clean. Cool in pans for 2 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
Meanwhile, combine sugar and cinnamon in a shallow bowl.
Brush outside of muffins with butter, then toss in cinnamon sugar. Serve with strawberries and a drizzle of maple syrup.
